languages.text: "Надеюсь, казни происходят публично, во имя воспитательного эффекта?"
"I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational benefit."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, казни происходят публично, во имя воспитательного эффекта?"

traits.locale_text: "I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational effect?"
"I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational effect?"
"I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational benefit."
"I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational benefit."
"I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational benefit."
"I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational benefit."

languages.text: « J'espère que, à des fins pédagogiques, toutes les exécutions sont publiques. »
languages.original_text: "I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational benefit."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que, à des fins pédagogiques, toutes les exécutions sont publiques. »

languages.text: «Espero que las ejecuciones sean públicas, para que tengan un efecto didáctico».
languages.original_text: "I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational benefit."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que las ejecuciones sean públicas, para que tengan un efecto didáctico».

languages.text: “我希望能公开进行处刑，这样才能杀一儆百。”
languages.original_text: "I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational benefit."

traits.locale_text: “我希望能公开进行处刑，这样才能杀一儆百。”

languages.text: 「教育のためにも、公開処刑を望む」
languages.original_text: "I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational benefit."

traits.locale_text: 「教育のためにも、公開処刑を望む」

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, die Hinrichtungen finden öffentlich statt, damit andere daraus lernen können."
languages.original_text: "I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational benefit."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, die Hinrichtungen finden öffentlich statt, damit andere daraus lernen können."

languages.text: "Umarım idamlar, öğretici faydalar sağlayacak şekilde halka açık yapılmıştır."
languages.original_text: "I hope the executions are carried out in public, for the educational benefit."

string_traits.trait: Встраивание генокрадов и офицеров в мейнсюжет (Зауэрбэк + Инфернус)
